short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hipcall extension for click to call feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Hipcall Extension,

Features
- Open the Hipcall web phone https://use.hipcall.com/phone/dialpad/ in a separate popup window.
- Click to call
long.tr:
Welcome to Hipcall Extension,

Features
- Open the Hipcall web phone https://phone.hipcall.com/#/ in a separate popup window.
- Click to call
- Send notification when incoming call.
